attributes.action: Redevelop the recreational area at river park in winchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The skatepark is run down, and badly built in the 1st place. The basketball courts are useless. One of the hoops is too high and the other is too low. One of the hoops is loose and is dangerous to anyone that plays basketball there. I think the whole thing should be knocked down, and built again.
